title: A joint resolution relating to the disapproval of the proposed sale to the Government of Qatar of certain defense articles and services.
short_title: A joint resolution relating to the disapproval of the proposed sale to the Government of Qatar of certain defense articles and services.
latest_major_action: Motion to discharge Senate Committee on Foreign Relations rejected by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 57. Record Vote Number: 162. (consideration: CR S3462)
summary: This joint resolution prohibits the proposed sale of various weapons, ammunition, and related support services to the government of Qatar, as described in Transmittal No. 19-14 sent to Congress on May 13, 2019.
summary_short: This joint resolution prohibits the proposed sale of various weapons, ammunition, and related support services to the government of Qatar, as described in Transmittal No. 19-14 sent to Congress on May 13, 2019.

actions.description: Motion to discharge Senate Committee on Foreign Relations rejected by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 57. Record Vote Number: 162. (consideration: CR S3462)
Motion to discharge Senate Committee on Foreign Relations made. (Pursuant to the Arms Export Control Act of 1976). (consideration: CR S3457-3462)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
